html:
6.16.23  3:51 am   Is it wrong to dip ketchup into your steak?

      that would be 2 wrongs

6.16.23  1:12 am   How do you know if you're cool?

      try a cool thing and see if you feel like yourself

6.15.23  8:14 pm   When working in a new project,, do you think it's better to work on it for a set amount of time every day, and set a schedule, or to just work for whatever time whenever you feel like it? I'm planning to work on an animation this summer and I don't want to leave it halfway done, but idk which approach is better 

      neither way works totally. try both. either way, you will probably mess it up. so try one way, mess it up, then next year try another way and mess it up a different way

6.15.23  7:58 pm   do you have a favorite state in the U.S.?

      no

6.15.23  6:40 pm   how can i incorporate solos into songs which are meant to be chords played on a ukulele or keys and sung. also i can barely do melodies and chords at the same time on keys

      how about singing the solo

6.15.23  5:16 pm   Am I your illusion or are you my illusion? 

      we are all each other's experience

6.15.23  4:52 pm   do you consider yourself to be a poet?

      that definition sounds slightly too archaic

6.15.23  3:54 pm   where do i start

      in the middle

6.15.23  3:08 pm   do you obsessively listen to your own song demos again and again until you perfect them?

      no. once i'm working on completing or perfecting a recording, that means i'm way past the demo and it's not called a demo anymore

6.15.23  2:57 pm   do you own a drum set

      yes

6.15.23  10:59 am   have you tied a piece of bread to a piece of toast?

      no, but i've used gravity to attach them

6.15.23  5:52 am   Do you feel random?

     no

     Like potato

     potato is not random. potato is one of the most common words for people to think of, when intending to evoke 'randomness'. therefore it is not random, but instead rather predictable

6.15.23  5:47 am   do you/have you ever dabbled in decryption before

      yes, just with letter substitutions in english messages, as a casual game

6.15.23  12:22 am   Would a flamingo look good in a tuxedo?

      yes, ....but now as i think about it more i realize that i may have imagined this different than you have. i was assuming there is already a person wearing the tuxedo, and the flamingo is perhaps in one of the pockets

6.14.23  10:44 pm   What should i tell to a friend of mine that get really afraid of talking in front of people,he gets in a strange mood. I wanted him to feel better about it. 

      there is a magic cure for this. the good news is, the cure always works. the bad news is, it only works gradually. and the cure is to keep speaking in public, frequently and often

6.14.23  9:28 pm   got any cool bug facts?

      they're small..... usually

6.14.23  8:33 pm   what is the most asinine/foolish thing that has happened to you recently?

      i finally gave into peer pressure and stopped wearing a mask in public indoor spaces because it's "not necessary" and "nobody does that anymore, you absolute weirdo". then a week later i promptly got a fairly uncomfortable case of covid 19, which, unfortunately, violates one of my major life-goals which was to not get it. fortunately i can still remember all of my multiplication tables, and smell them too

6.14.23  8:09 pm   Is "ueqstions" pronounced questions

      yes

6.14.23  7:56 pm   How do I live in a small wooden box?

      choose a box that is slightly larger than you

6.14.23  7:53 pm   when was the last time you ate a barbecue-flavored potato chip?

      i assume it was last february

6.14.23  1:58 pm   can i translate your songs into german

      translating songs requires a total rewrite, from scratch. all music, melodies, and words need to be re-imagined in the target language

6.14.23  12:44 pm   what the heck is a pizza

      it's a combination of Lasagna and a plate

6.14.23  10:45 am   hey bill have you ever considered the possibility of there being a drink called 'dr. pepper'?

     no. that doesn't make sense

     i have and i'll tell you my friends all thought i was crazy.

6.14.23  9:01 am   if there is a Lake Superior, where is Lake Inferior?

      off the coast of Ohio

6.14.23  8:35 am   Is it called "junk food" because you feel like garbage after eating it?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.14.23  7:24 am   So does the story in "2 friends" continuously circle around forever?

     no, just once

     Like does it go beach, painting, restaurant all the time?

     no. starts at the beach, then the art gallery then the road, to the restaurant, then back to the beach. the end

6.14.23  6:26 am   how to count to 3?

     1, 2, 3

     how can i count higher than that?

     1, 2, 3, 4

6.14.23  1:58 am   What radio frequency was the radio station in "Slow Down" broadcasting on?

      'different'

6.14.23  1:30 am   whats your favorite article of clothing

      the 'outfit'

6.14.23  1:09 am   When characters in a cartoon draw cartoon characters, do those drawings look like cartoons to them?

      only if they are indeed drawing "cartoon cartoon characters". it's hard to tell whether that is what your question means, because it is sometimes assumed that everything in cartoon world is cartoon, so possibly the second cartoon factor may or may not be inferred, given that it was already said once

6.13.23  11:53 pm   can a hurricane swim?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

     If so, can it dance?

     yes

     if so can it BECOME?

     yes

6.13.23  6:46 pm   What is one kind of character you have wanted to write but haven't because you don't yet know how?

      i wouldn't know. if i can think it, i can write it. so if there's something i can't write yet, it means i haven't thought of it yet

6.13.23  6:02 pm   what color is too color...ey?

      grey

6.13.23  5:52 pm   What should I do if I get bored?

      try to build Rome in a day

6.13.23  5:41 pm   is transcribing/learning keyboard solos from songs i enjoy a good way to improve my improvisation skills?

     it almost seems like it would be. and i did that a lot when i was younger. it was a neat exercise and it expanded my mind slightly, but it does not feel like it was particularly helpful for my improv. because, the mental process that i'm going through while playing scripted material is completely different from what the original improviser was experiencing. However, it does seem to perhaps give a sneak preview of some of the things that may be possible later when you actually learn to set yourself free like they have. something to look forward to

     or is that bad, because it locks me into learning predetermined stuff, which is the opposite of improv

     it won't hurt you. but i think the magic of improv is going to come from somewhere else. somewhere no one else has been before

6.13.23  5:31 pm   can you uninvent capital letters?

      nope. still need them

6.13.23  3:51 pm   favorite instrument

      the floor

6.13.23  3:21 pm   opinion on cherries

      i wonder if you can put something on top of a cherry

6.13.23  2:59 pm   I had a dream and you were in it. Sorry

      that's ok

6.13.23  2:47 pm   does pizza belong under pineapple?

      AROUND the pineapple

6.13.23  10:31 am   Is North Carolina or South Carolina the superior Carolina?

      it's a tie

6.13.23  9:43 am   whats your opinion on being serious

      hilarious

6.13.23  9:39 am   have you ever befriended an entire island?

     not real ones

      i had, and it's mostly pleasurable

6.13.23  7:21 am   opinions about oysters?

      too real

6.13.23  6:55 am   How can I express myself

      anyway

6.13.23  3:03 am   I just want to say that I could probably write an essay on why watching your videos and reading these Q&As is such an extremely cathartic, relaxing, and mind-centering experience, but for now I think I'll just chill here for awhile.

      holy smokes, you are very friendly

6.13.23  3:01 am   how do you fill your music with such minute details and interesting one-off sounds? is there a philosophy you keep in mind when adding those?

      part of the trick for this is a backwards process: instead of searching for a sound to fit the moment, search through the song to find which moment in the song needs the sound you have on hand

6.13.23  12:47 am   Do you ever incorporate classical music when you write music?

      i don't see why not

6.12.23  9:11 pm   do you ever watch your own videos after they're made

      not very often

6.12.23  8:23 pm   What is the meaning of the lyrics in Might Quit?

      it seems to have themes of independence, finding your way in the world, etc
